data.name: Nursery Slime
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826160


About the Game

Nursery Slime is an RPG game developed by Doubles Core (だぶるすこあ) and published by OTAKU Plan

STORY

The protagonist was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end.
Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest.
The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight.
... In this way, the hilarious daily life of the loser adventurer and the slime girl began.

FEATURES

  • Classic Japanese RPG
  • Happy and fluent pure love story
  • Transformation system
  • Ability training system

data.short_description: He was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end. Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest. The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game will appear bare and sexually suggestive content that is not suitable for minors; Please decide whether to play or not.
